Html:
I'm trying to open the SL4 demos with VS 2010 RC and it's can't open Core.Silverlight4 project.

What I am missing ?

I believe you are on the wrong forum, but to answer your question....  VS2010 RC does not support SL4.  It will not until they release the next bits @ MIX2010.  If you want to use SL4, stay with VS2010 B2 for now.
